system.description: This spell defends a stronghold (up to 200 sq. ft. per caster level, up to 20 ft. high). Effects created: fog in corridors (obscures sight beyond 5 ft.); all doors arcane locked; webs on stairs (regrow in 10 min. if destroyed); at direction choices, 50% chance intruders believe they go the opposite direction; one door per level hidden by silent image as wall. You also choose one: dancing lights (4 corridors), magic mouth (2 places), stinking cloud (2 places), gust of wind (1 corridor/room), or suggestion (one 5-ft. square). Dispel magic removes individual effects; Mage's disjunction destroys all.

components.materialDescription: Burning incense, brimstone and oil, a knotted string, and a small amount of blood. Focus: small silver rod.

system.range: Anywhere within the area to be warded
